C

Card - Interface in Model.Card
This is the interface of a Card that contains the methods signatures for every card
Charity - Class in Model.Card
This class represents the Mail Card Charity
Charity(String, String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class Model.Card.Charity
Constructor: Constructs a new Charity Card with the given name.
Controller - package Controller
 
Controller - Class in Controller
This class is responsible for all the control of the game
Controller() - Constructor for class Controller.Controller
 
controller(Player, Player, Pack_of_cards, Board, BoardGUI) - Static method in class Controller.Controller
Observer: Controls the flow of the game and updates the GUI of the game
post-conditions: Rolls the Dice of the Player P1 and then updates his pawn and call the methods Position_Setup, end_turn, Sunday_Match.
cul_Move_Position(Board) - Method in class Model.Player.Player
transformer(mutative): It finds the next Deal or Buyer Position and store it to the Players MovePosition
postcondition:finds the next Deal or Buyer Position and sets it to the Players MovePosition.
